com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api

Interface JCGLTexturesType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JCGLTextures2DType, JCGLTexturesCubeType

    public interface JCGLTexturesType
extends JCGLTextures2DType, JCGLTexturesCubeType
    The interface to OpenGL textures.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int textureGetMaximumSize() 
      List<JCGLTextureUnitType> textureGetUnits() 
      boolean textureUnitIsBound(JCGLTextureUnitType unit) 
      void textureUnitUnbind(JCGLTextureUnitType unit)
      Unbind whatever texture is bound to the texture unit unit (if any).

      • Methods inherited from interface com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api.JCGLTextures2DType

        texture2DAllocate, texture2DBind, texture2DDelete, texture2DGetImage, texture2DIsBound, texture2DIsBoundAnywhere, texture2DRegenerateMipmaps, texture2DUpdate

      • Methods inherited from interface com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api.JCGLTexturesCubeType

        textureCubeAllocate, textureCubeBind, textureCubeDelete, textureCubeGetImageLH, textureCubeGetImageRH, textureCubeIsBound, textureCubeIsBoundAnywhere, textureCubeRegenerateMipmaps, textureCubeUpdateLH, textureCubeUpdateRH

    • Method Detail

      • textureGetMaximumSize

        int textureGetMaximumSize()
                   throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        The maximum texture size supported by the current implementation. 'Size' refers to the length of a side, so if the implementation returns 8192, the largest texture that can be created is 8192 * 8192.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs.

      • textureGetUnits

        List<JCGLTextureUnitType> textureGetUnits()
                                   throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        All available texture units for the current implementation.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs.

      • textureUnitIsBound

        boolean textureUnitIsBound(JCGLTextureUnitType unit)
                    throws JCGLException
        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit.
        Returns:
        true iff the the texture unit unit has any texture bound to it.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs.

      • textureUnitUnbind

        void textureUnitUnbind(JCGLTextureUnitType unit)
                throws JCGLException
        Unbind whatever texture is bound to the texture unit unit (if any).
        Parameters:
        unit - The texture unit
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs.
